column1: '''''Mythlore'' 30''' (Volume 8, Issue 4) is an issue of the ''[[Mythlore]]'' journal, published by the [[Mythopoeic Society]].
*"Motif of the Garden in the Novels of Tolkien, Williams and Lewis"
*"The Irish Mythological Cycle and Tolkien's Eldar"
*"The Cosmic Gospel, C.S. Lewis and L'Engle"
*"Felicitious Space in the Fantasies of George MacDoanld and Mervyn Peake"
*"A Jungian Reading of The Kalevala 500-1300, Finnish Shamanism"
